Koga Shuko/Chordate/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Ramhorn:


Two laser bolts struck Chordate's back, sending him slamming towards Barrett 
from behind.

Anubis raised his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the Ark.

Hades fired a missile from his rocket launcher off at the Ark.

Unitron raised both laser rifles, firing three bolts from each rifle at the 
Ark, laughing.

---

Ramhorn awoke suddenly, feeling the Ark shake.  "Damnit!  It's one thing 
after another!" taking out his sub-machine gun, he headed for the main doors 
of the Ark.
